name: Path M Perihilar Bile Ducts
title: Pathologic M
notes: **Note:**  Para-aortic and pericaval lymph nodesare classified as regional nodes for TNM 7 staging and are coded in regional lymph nodes.
rows:
Distant lymph node(s) including: 
    Peripancreatic (along body and tail of pancreas only)
    
Distant lymph nodes, NOS

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes 

Distant metastasis, NOS

Stated as M1
